content:
{"name": "Epworth United Methodist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Clients must display a need for food and qualify if they receive any of the following types of assistance:
1. Temporary Assistance for Needy Families (TANF)
2. Food Stamps (SNAP)
3. Supplemental Security Income (SSI)
4. Women,Infants and Children (WIC)
5. Medicaid
6. Clients also qualify if they meet income guidelines as defined by the federal government or experience a disaster such as loss of income, housing or domestic issues such as divorce. 

**This entails clients waiting in a line in their cars for the food to be distributed & food loaded into their cars by pantry volunteers. We ask clients to be respectful of others, be aware of traffic around the church and to stay in their cars during the food distribution process.**
 ", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "501 Morgan Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Palmyra", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08065", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.00620389999999, "longitude": -75.0210027}, "phones": [{"number": "(856) 829-1908", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Drive-Thru Only"}]}
